duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining interactive and visually appealing reports, dashboards, and data visualizations.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify key business questions and define analytics requirements.
Gather, clean, validate, and transform large and complex datasets from various sources.
Develop and maintain data models, reports, dashboards, and visualization tools to provide insights to stakeholders.
Conduct in-depth data analysis to identify patterns, trends, and correlations that inform strategic business decisions.
Create and present comprehensive reports and presentations that effectively communicate analytical findings and recommendations to technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Monitor and evaluate data quality, integrity, and completeness, and ensure data accuracy and consistency.
Identify opportunities for process improvement and develop strategies to optimize business performance.
Stay current with industry trends, best practices, and emerging business intelligence and analytics technologies.
Collaborate with IT teams to optimize data infrastructure, implement data governance practices, and ensure data security.
Develop and implement efficient data models and relationships for accurate and timely reporting.

Generates standard and custom statistical and analytical reports as requested using the ERP system. Output report design can be Microsoft Excel, Power BI, SQL reports, or other relevant software programs.
Analyzes operational data and displays strong analytical and reasoning skills by leveraging reports to identify areas for operational improvements and efficiencies.
Experience in software application support analysis, modifications, enhancement, design, implementation, testing, validation, and troubleshooting.
Extract datasets from the data warehouse and other applications as necessary and conduct detailed research into data and performance changes identified in dashboard reports.
Ability to understand and create complex functions; ability to read/write technical documents, emails and great customer service skills and interest.
Experience working with production staff to identify, analyze, and document problems, software design deficiencies, or enhancements within the software.
Experience in Information Systems, accounting, and software development, with the manufacturing industry desirable.
Experience working closely with the infrastructure teams to ensure that the applications and interfaces are designed and implemented based on valid standards and in accordance with sound practice.
Ability to Identify and assist in resolving issues that arise within the department relating to the satisfactory operation of the software module(s) both during and after installation.
Automate the creation of reports to maximize the efficiency of the ERP software.
Experience working with vendor staff to identify process changes, software improvements, and hardware needs to maximize system efficiency.
Good time management skills. Experience balancing multiple projects simultaneously and responding to changing deadlines and priorities.

skills.skill: Microsoft BI Suite (Visual Studio, Power Query)
Data Extraction, Transformation, and Loading (ETL) Processes

education_certification.credential: Five years of equivalent hands-on work experience and college-level coursework in computer science, information systems, or related fields. Proven experience as an Application SME or similar role, with a strong track record of delivering high-quality reports and dashboards. 3 to 5+ years of SQL development and experience working with relational databases. 3+ years of Power BI Reporting. 3+ Crystal Reports and Microsoft BI Suite (Visual Studio, Power Query). Familiarity with data extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL) processes and tools. Strong foundation in design and development. Microsoft Certification.
